cui_name: Childhood Desmoplastic Small Round Cell Tumor
reasoning: Extremely rare pediatric malignancy, <0.01 per 100k. Approximately 30-40 new cases reported globally per year based on case series literature.
source: Gerald WL et al. (1998). Clinical, pathologic, and molecular spectrum of tumors associated with t(11;22)(p13;q12): desmoplastic small round-cell tumor and its variants. J Clin Oncol. 16(9):3028-36
